name: Flávio Dias
title: Industrial & Process Engineer
summary: Industrial & Process Engineer with strong experience in aluminum casting (HPDC/LPDC), tooling development, stamping, welding, layout redesign, and continuous-improvement initiatives. Led large-scale industrial projects including mold-renewal master plans, process optimization, and manufacturing technical planning (MTP). Skilled in Lean Six Sigma (Green Belt), PDCA, DMAIC, and industrial diagnostics applied in GEMBA to eliminate defects, reduce scrap, optimize flow, and improve operational efficiency. Experienced supporting production, solving chronic failures, implementing MES systems, and improving technical documentation and standard work. Strong analytical mindset with an engineering foundation in mechanical systems, complemented by advanced skills in Excel, Power BI, Python and data-driven decision support.
subsummary: Industrial Processes · Lean Six Sigma · Casting (HPDC/LPDC) · Welding & Stamping · Tooling · Layout · Reliability · Data-Driven Improvement

experience.title: Industrial Engineering Specialist
tasks: Coordinated HPDC/LPDC mold renewal program with annual budget of BRL 8 million, ensuring technical accuracy, schedule adherence, and cost control.
Developed a semi-automated Excel-based master plan for mold management, increasing predictability and traceability of technical deliverables.
Implemented and acted as key-user of the MES system for HPDC/LPDC machines, enabling real-time monitoring of casting parameters and production stability.
Led factory layout restructuring projects, optimizing flow, space usage, and integration between tooling, engineering, and production teams.
Provided technical support for defect analysis, casting troubleshooting, dimensional deviation investigations, and flow-related issues.
Reviewed, improved, and standardized tooling projects (HPDC/LPDC molds, devices, fixtures), reducing tryout time and increasing reliability.
Represented Yamaha in the International Foundry Conference in Taiwan (2024), presenting MES integration results in English.
Supported manufacturing technical planning (MTP) with robust analyses and engineering criteria to support investment decisions.

Created detailed operational procedures to ensure standardization, repeatability, and correct execution of manufacturing steps.

Planned and coordinated technical improvements in stamping tools, enhancing production efficiency and reliability.

experience.title: Industrial Analyst – Welding & Stamping

Created and maintained technical documentation, quality controls, and standard work for production support.
Contributed to ISO 9001 compliance through process standardization and corrective actions.

comments: Strong foundation in statics, dynamics, vibrations, mechanical design, materials, and manufacturing processes.
